original_text: And Hezekiah slept with his fathers, and Manasseh his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 히스기야가 그의 조상들과 함께 자고 그의 아들 므낫세가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah slept with his fathers
and Manasseh his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 므낫세가 그를 대신하여 통치하니
